page.title: 06A Christening
page.content: Well, when Sharon asked if I could go to the christening. I was delighted. Kimberly is no relation to me, she is Sharon's neice. We had to be down at the local St. Peter's church by 11.30.I wore a black and blue dress, with jewelry.The children were about 7 months old.There were about five children being christened. They wore little suits or dresses. Kimberly wore a white lacy dress and bonnet.She did not cry when the Vicar put a cross shape on her forehead. Afterwards we went back to Mary's house for refreshments.We had sandwiches, buns and,best of all, a big cake shaped like a baby,with frilly icing all over.Afterwards we all went home. We were exhausted. The baby was christened{Kimberly Ann {Thorpe.}
